testimonials.name: Jason Barron
testimonials.description: Marcel is an exceptional person who epitomizes excellence in all aspects of life. His unwavering positive attitude and exceptional work ethic is contagious, inspiring all those around him to strive for greatness. He possesses the ability to communicate effectively, listen gracefully, and offer valuable insights to help others grow.

testimonials.name: Zubair Matthee
testimonials.description: Marcel is a hardworking individual who consistently demonstrates a strong work ethic and dedication towards his goals. He is willing to put in the time and effort to achieve success.

testimonials.name: Connor Winkworth
testimonials.description: Marcel is dedicated and committed to his craft, constantly pushing himself to improve and overcome any challenges he faces. He has a passion for what he does, which fuels his determination to put in the necessary time and effort to achieve his goals.

testimonials.name: Mish-al Taliep
testimonials.description: Marcel is able to inspire and motivate those around him through their infectious positive attitude. His charisma enables them to be an effective leader, building strong relationships with colleagues and inspiring them to work towards a shared goal.

testimonials.name: Jamie-Lee Kinnear
testimonials.description: Marcel is a remarkable programmer and has an analytical approach to problem solving. He is a hardworking individual and dedicated to his work. He is a great peer and a team player. He show's initiative and I believe he would be a valuable asset to any company that would be lucky to have him.

testimonials.name: Uthmaan Samsodien
testimonials.description: Marcel is an exceptionally capable individual whose analytical skills set him apart. His meticulous approach to problem-solving is commendable. His ability to dissect complex problems and devise effective solutions is truly remarkable.

skills.title: Html
skills.desc: HTML is a very straightforward language to learn and is incredibly easy to use, even for beginners. With only a basic understanding of HTML, you can create webpages with ease.

skills.title: CSS
skills.desc: CSS is an incredibly easy language to learn, with its simple syntax and straightforward rules. It is a great language for beginners to web development, as it can be picked up quickly and put into practice with tangible results.

skills.title: Javascript
skills.desc: JavaScript is a challenging language to learn,but with extra effort and dedication, you can get the hang of its intuitive syntax and straightforward concepts.

skills.title: Git
skills.desc: I am very dedicated to using GitHub. I find it to be an invaluable tool for tracking my code changes, pushing my work to remote repositories, and collaborating with other developers. I'm proud of how far I've come in my understanding of using GitHub.

skills.title: Bootstrap
skills.desc: Bootstrap is incredibly easy-to-use, making it a great choice for developers (like myself) of all skill levels to make use of. With its intuitive syntax, creating responsive websites and apps with Bootstrap has never been simpler.

skills.title: Vue
skills.desc: I was surprised at how quickly I learned to use Vue. With its intuitive syntax and well-structured documentation, it's incredible how quickly I became proficient with Vue. Im looking forward to learning more
